definitions.definition: concerning the writing, study, or content of literature, especially of the kind valued for quality of form.
examples: the great literary works of the nineteenth century

definitions.definition: concerned with literature as a profession.
examples: it was signed by such literary figures as Maya Angelou

definitions.definition: (of language) associated with literary works or other formal writing; having a marked style intended to create a particular emotional effect.
examples: formal, written, poetic, dramatic; Moreelaborate, ornate, flowery; inkhorn "literary language"Moreelaborate, ornate, flowery; inkhorn literary language
